channel.title: Im back!
channel.description:
I left a while ago, leaving with the thread about my notepad.
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586230.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586230.0.html[/url]
Now, I am bringing you a thread with two purposes. One, should I remake my notepad? (lost the source) vote in the pole. Two, I have made a 2d game which I am quite proud of.
[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/Boxman.jar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/Boxman.jar[/url]
I call it BoxMan, it takes on the pacman mentality, but completely different.
Features - -
1) Landmines. :) 2) Ball Collecting 3) Map Making 4) Randomly Generated Maps 5) Enemy Path Finding 6) Pause/Unpause
------- Restrictions -
1) Can't hold the arrow button to move, press it to move 2) Enemy moves fast as love. <-- loving the anti cursing thing -----
Will post pics.

item.title: Im back!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

You don’t need two topics for this.

Read full topic

item.title: Im back!
item.dc:creator: @Scyth1 Scyth_
item.description:
@Scyth1 wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:12, topic:489918”][quote author=Scyth_ link=topic=608151.msg4250122#msg4250122 date=1362291043]

How much of this code is yours, and how much did you steal

The code is all mine, the features are all mine with the exception of random map generation which my friend thought of, but I implemented
[/quote]
What about TextIO then.[/quote]

Its not in there anymore, see the updated version

Read full topic

item.title: Im back!
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:

Read full topic

item.title: Im back!
item.dc:creator: @Scyth1 Scyth_
item.description:
@Scyth1 wrote:

I left a while ago, leaving with the thread about my notepad.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586230.0.html

Now, I am bringing you a thread with two purposes. One, should I remake my notepad? (lost the source) vote in the pole. Two, I have made a 2d game which I am quite proud of.

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/Boxman.jar

I call it BoxMan, it takes on the pacman mentality, but completely different.

Features - -

  1. Landmines.
  2. Ball Collecting
  3. Map Making
  4. Randomly Generated Maps
  5. Enemy Path Finding
  6. Pause/Unpause

Restrictions -

  1. Can’t hold the arrow button to move, press it to move
  2. Enemy moves fast as love. <-- loving the anti cursing thing

Will post pics.

Read full topic
